scripts.inject-polyfill: (echo "if (typeof globalThis === 'undefined') { (function () { if (typeof self !== 'undefined') { self.globalThis = self; } else if (typeof window !== 'undefined') { window.globalThis = window; } else if (typeof global !== 'undefined') { global.globalThis = global; } else { this.globalThis = this; } })(); }" && cat dist/index.js) > dist/index.tmp && mv dist/index.tmp dist/index.js
scripts.build: npx parcel build src/index.ts && npm run inject-polyfill
